com.raystech.proj0.ctl

Class MarksheetCtl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.raystech.proj0.ctl.BaseCtl
      • com.raystech.proj0.ctl.MarksheetCtl

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/ctl/Marksheet")
public class MarksheetCtl
extends BaseCtl
    Contains navigation logics for Marksheet and Marksheet List usecases.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Singleton
